conversation.content: Is there a family-friendly hotel with a pool in Lisbon?
Yes! The OceanView Resort has a large outdoor pool, kids’ activities, and family rooms. It’s near the beach too. Want more info about the kids’ facilities?
Sorry, there is no babysitting service at this hotel. Do you have any other questions?
